price: Nanso wͻbuu no ᴐtorofo, na wͻkum (yoma bedeε) no. Enti wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn de wͻn bͻne sεee wͻn pasaa kataa wͻn so pεpεεpε.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu faʿaqarūhā fadamdama ʿalayhim rabbuhum bidhanbihim fasawwāhā
